title: Bloomberg Markets: Mandel on Decent Global Fundamentals
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Mandel on Decent Global Fundamentals
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ben Mandel Global Strategist JP Morgan Investment Management Discussing seeing investment opportunities "everywhere" from the JP Morgan Defined Contribution Summit in NYC.
